ext_descriptions.ext_description: A land_template_terminal_class lists the classes of the land template terminal. The class description is in the context of a limited geometric domain stratum virtualization defined by the extent of the related land template. The description assumes that there is a vertical cutting plane through the stratum in the neighborhood of the terminal.
specifies that the terminal is a point on the horizontal surface of a stratum near the cutting plane;
specifies that the terminal is an edge curve on the surface of a stratum and is in the domain of the cutting plane and of the stratum horizontal surface;
specifies that the terminal is a point on the edge of a stratum and is in the domain of the cutting plane and of the stratum horizontal surface;
specifies that the terminal is an area on the surface of a stratum in the neighborhood of the cutting plane but need not intersect the domain of the cutting plane;
A layer_position_type lists the types of the layer position in the sequence of layers.
specifies that the layer position is secondary, a design layer opposite that of the primary layer;
specifies that a layer may be in any sequential position;
specifies that layer position is either the primary or secondary layer;
specifies that layer position is the z-axis zero position in the vertical sequence of layers;
specifies that layer position is not one of primary or secondary;
A layer_purpose lists the purposes of the layer, in the context of the types of signals intended to be implemented.
specifies that layer is used for a signal other than power or ground;
specifies that layer is used for lands only;
specifies that layer is used for power or ground signals;
A pca_product_design_object_category lists the categories of the pca product design object.
specifies that an instance that in this category is an implementation of the assembly component;
specifies that an instance that in this category is an implementation of the assembly module;
specifies that an instance that in this category is an implementation of the assembly module component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the assembly module component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the assembly module macro component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the assembly module macro component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the bare die component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the bare die component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the bonded conductive base blind via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the buried via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the cable component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component mounting feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage and contact size dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the conductive interconnect element terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the conductive interconnect element with pre defined transitions;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the conductive interconnect element with user defined single transition;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the connected area component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the contact size dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the contact size dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the cutout edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the dielectric material passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the electrical isolation laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the embedded component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the fiducial;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the fill area;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the filled area material removal laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the inter stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect component interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component stratum based terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component surface feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module edge;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module macro component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module macro component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interface access material removal laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interface access stratum feature template component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interface component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interfacial connection;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the internal probe access area;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the join two physical connectivity definition supporting inter stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the join two physical connectivity definition supporting printed component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the laminate text component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the laminate text string component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the land interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the land join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the material removal laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the minimally defined component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the movable packaged component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the multi layer material removal laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the multi layer stratum feature template component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the non conductive base blind via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the non functional land interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the non functional land join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the packaged component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the packaged component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the packaged connector component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the packaged connector component interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the partially plated cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the partially plated interconnect module edge;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical connectivity interrupting cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical network supporting inter stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated conductive base blind via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated cutout edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated interconnect module edge;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated interconnect module edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated passage or unsupported passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the primary stratum indicator symbol;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the printed component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the printed connector component interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the probe access area;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the routed interconnect component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the routed physical component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the special symbol laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the stratum feature template component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the thermal isolation laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unrouted conductive interconnect element;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unsupported passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unsupported passage dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via and contact size dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via and contact size dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via terminal;
A predefined_documentation_layer_purpose lists the predefined purpose of the documentation layer.
specifies that documentation layer is soldermask;
specifies that documentation layer is solderpaste;
specifies that documentation layer is silkscreen;
specifies that documentation layer is generic layer;
specifies that documentation layer is glue;
specifies that documentation layer is gluemask;
specifies that documentation layer is pastemask;
A spacing_type lists the types of the spacing.
specifies that spacing is measured between nearest boundaries of the design items indicated;
specifies that spacing is measured between centroids of the design items indicated;
specifies that spacing is measured between furthest boundaries of the design items indicated;
A stiffness_class lists the types of the stiffness.
specifies that the type is fluid like;
specifies that the type is conformal coat;
specifies type is stiff laminate;
A Stratum_feature_template is a type of that is a definition or partial definition of a . A Stratum_feature_template may be a . A Stratum_feature_template defines a contiguous material shape.
specifies the role of the for the . The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_description.p: A Material_removal_feature_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be removed from a feature. A Material_removal_feature_template may be an or a .

example.p: Figure 7 illustrates a template and associated parameters designed for electrical isolation. For a specific template, values will be assigned for the parameters and the explicit geometry will be representative of the assigned parameter values.

Figure 8 illustrates a template and associated parameters designed for thermal isolation. For a specific template, values will be assigned for the parameters and the explicit geometry will be representative of the assigned parameter values. In this example, an instance would be a complex instance including and Material_removal_feature_template.

figure.title: Material_removal_feature_template supports thermal isolation and electrical conduction

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Material_removal_feature_template. There shall be one or more for an of_stratum_technology. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_description.p: An Electrical_isolation_removal_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be removed from a feature. The purposes predefined in this part of ISO 10303 include electrical and thermal isolation.

example.p: Figure 1 illustrates a template and associated parameters designed for electrical isolation. For a specific template, values will be assigned for the parameters and the explicit geometry will be representative of the assigned parameter values.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Electrical_isolation_removal_template.

A Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence is a type of that describes the physical spacing between one of an assembly_module_assembly_component, an assembly_module_component_feature, an interconnect_module_cutout, an interconnect_module_fill_area, an interconnect_module_design_intent_modification, an interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature, an interconnect_module_cutout_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_interconnect_module_edge, an interconnect_module_interconnect_module_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_plated_cutout, an interconnect_module_plated_cutout_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_plated_interconnect_module_edge, an interconnect_module_plated_interconnect_module_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_plated_passage, a category consisting of the union of an interconnect_module_plated_passage category and an interconnect_module_plated_unsupported_passage category, an interconnect_module_unsupported_passage, an interconnect_module_stratum_feature, or an interconnect_module_via, and another of these categories of design objects. A Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence may be a . The requirement shall be imposed between the boundaries of members of the the relevant categories or between centroids.
The category names correspond to the category of equivalent application object names.
Support for requirements between boundaries and centroids is not supported by this part of ISO 10303.
Assembly_module_assembly_component corresponds to category. Assembly_module_component_feature corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_cutout corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_fill_area corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_stratum_feature corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_via corresponds to category.
Any subtype of an item in a category shall qualify as part of that category.
This part of ISO 10303 supports several spacing requirements in this Application Object.
A pair of categories is used for this requirement occurrence.
In domain terms, when a Via to Via spacing is to be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the reference_design_object_category whose value is interconnect_module_via and the dependent_design_object_category whose value is interconnect_module_via shall be greater than 5 mm.
In domain terms, when the distance from a cutout to a trace must be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the reference_design_object_category whose value is interconnect_module_cutout and the dependent_design_object_category whose value is interconnect_module_stratum_feature shall be greater than 5 mm.
specifies the for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence. The of_spacing_type is either centroid, or nearest_boundary, or furthest_boundary for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence.
an attribute inherited from the supertype specifies the role of the for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence. There shall be exactly one for a Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence.

specifies the for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence. The dependent_design_object_category specifies one role of either an assembly_module_assembly_component, an assembly_module_component_feature, an interconnect_module_cutout, an interconnect_module_fill_area, an interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature, an interconnect_module_stratum_feature, or an interconnect_module_via, for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence.

specifies the for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence. The reference_design_object_category specifies one role of either an assembly_module_assembly_component, an assembly_module_component_feature, an interconnect_module_cutout, an interconnect_module_fill_area, an interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature, an interconnect_module_stratum_feature, or an interconnect_module_via, for the Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence.
The combination of the reference_design_object_category and the dependent_design_object_category shall be unique within a population of Layout_spacing_requirement_occurrences.
The of required_coordinated_characteristic shall be of type .

A Material_addition_feature_template is a type of that describes the shape of material to be added to a design feature. A Material_addition_feature_template may be either a , a , or a . If a Material_addition_feature_template is not the supertype, there shall be no explicit shape information provided. The instantiation of the subtypes is only supported through the association with a padstack definition.

A Design_layer_technology is a type of . The Design_layer_technology is a technology specification tailored for those materials intended to be used to implement the direct connectivity as described in a design. The same Design_layer_technology may be used in multiple designs for multiple products, since there is no dependence of the Design_layer_technology on the design referencing it. A Design_layer_technology shall not be used for printed components as defined by where conductivity class other than 'conductive' is required because the conductivity class of a Design_layer_technology is required to be 'conductive'.
An example where an application of Design_layer_technology is inappropriate is for paste resistors since the conductivity class for a paste resistor is 'resistive'. The terminals of the paste resistors may be bonded to features of a design layer during fabrication.
An example where an application of Design_layer_technology is required is for printed coils because the coil is fabricated from the same physical layer as the rest of the wiring that implements the interconnect.
specifies the of the smallest permissible distance between features for the Design_layer_technology.
specifies the of the smallest permissible extent of a feature for the Design_layer_technology.
specifies the for the Design_layer_technology. The design_layer_purpose specifies one of the lands_only, other_signal, or power_or_ground purpose of the for the Design_layer_technology.
The inherited from shall be at least one of: thermally, electrically, optically or magnetically conductive.

A Documentation_layer_technology is a type of that may have patterns applied and whose purpose is not for directly implementing point to point connectivity as in the . A Documentation_layer_technology shall be used for printed components as defined by
where conductivity class other than 'conductive' is required because the conductivity class of a Documentation_layer_technology may be something other than 'conductive'. The externally_defined_documentation_layer_purpose provides a facility to specify the detailed nature of the application. A standard external to this part of ISO 10303 or industrial exchange agreements may formalize the externally_defined_documentation_layer_purpose.
An example where an application of Documentation_layer_technology is appropriate is for paste resistors since the conductivity class for a paste resistor is 'resistive'.
An example where an application of Documentation_layer_technology is appropriate is for paste capacitors since the conductivity class for a paste capacitor is 'non conductive'.
specifies either , , , , , , to describe the purpose defined in this part of ISO 10303 for the Documentation_layer_technology. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Documentation_layer_technology is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Documentation_layer_technology as its .

ext_description.p: pre_defined_documentation_layer_purpose or shall exist but not both together.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template is a type of . A Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template may be a or a . This template shape is dependent only on the shape of the it is intended to mate with.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template as its . There shall be one or more for a Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template. Fabrication and assembly tolerances define the required shapes and variances for the terminal shapes.

specifies one of the roles of the for the Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template. The maximum_attachment_region_size specifies the largest for the Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies one of the roles of the for the Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template. The minimum_attachment_region_size specifies the smallest for the Default_attachment_size_based_land_physical_template. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
If both minimum_attachment_region_size and maximum_attachment_region_size exist, then they will be different instances. Otherwise only maximum_attachment_region_size shall exist.
A Default_land_physical_template is a type of . A Default_land_physical_template is either a or a .

an attribute inherited from the specifies the role of the for the Default_land_physical_template. There may be more than one for a Default_land_physical_template. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
A Dependent_material_removal_feature_template is a type of .
specifies the role of the for the Dependent_material_removal_feature_template.

ext_description.p: A Land_physical_template is a type of . A Land_physical_template may be a . If the material the Land_physical_template is composed of it conductive, the Land_physical_template provides the functionality of a short among its terminals.

example.p: Figure 3 illustrates explicit geometry that represents simplified Land_physical_template.

ext_description.p: specifies the role of the for the Land_physical_template. The pre_defined_classification_code need not be specified for a specific Land_physical_template.
ext_description.note: IEC 61182-1 provides a set of identifiers. See figure 4.

The Land_physical_template, , and the Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing capabilities of this part of ISO 10303 may be used to unambiguously exchange the shape of both pre-defined patterns that include only geometry (as from IEC 61182-1) and enterprise defined patterns. When this facility is used to create more than one equivalent definition, it may not be possible to maintain knowledge of the connection functionality of the definition. This is because is an atomic concept in this part of ISO 10303.

The , , and the Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing capabilities of this part of ISO 10303 may be used to unambiguously exchange both the shape and connection knowledge of patterns that include pre-defined geometry (as from IEC 61182-1) and enterprise defined geometry that have explicit definitions of the fabrication and assembly constraints.
The Land_physical_template inherit material property data from .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Land_physical_template is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Land_physical_template as its . There shall be one or more for a Land_physical_template. Fabrication and assembly tolerances define the required shapes and variances for the terminal shapes.
The pre_defined_classification_code shall be unique within a population of Land_physical_templates.

ext_description.p: A Land_template_interface_terminal is a type of that has an external access functionality. A Land_template_interface_terminal redefines the associated_definition attribute inherited from to only reference a .

example.p: Figure 5 is a plan view that illustrates the geometry that represents the interface terminal for a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Land_template_interface_terminal.

ext_description.p: A Land_template_join_terminal is a type of that has an internal access functionality.

example.p: Figure 6 is a plan view that illustrates the geometry that represents the join terminal for a . In the plan view, the join terminal is on the periphery.

ext_description.p: A Land_template_terminal is a type of . A Land_template_terminal is either a or a . The connection_zone_category shall be supplied if the is supplied. Each member of connection_zone_category shall correspond to exactly one member of terminal_connection_zone.
ext_description.note: The binding of a member of connection_zone_category to the member of terminal_connection_zone is formally defined in the mapping table in clause 5.1

ext_description.p: specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Land_template_terminal is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Land_template_terminal as its .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies either an edge_curve, an edge_point, a surface_area, or a surface_point as a category of the for the Land_template_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified. There may be zero or more connection_zone_category. The interpretation of this attribute shall be to the description of the relationship between the terminal and each individual connection zone.
an attribute identifies the Land_template_terminal.

specifies the role of the for the Land_template_terminal. There may be one or more for the Land_template_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If the source system contains the data, then the terminal_connection_zone shall be supplied.
specifies the role of the for the Land_template_terminal.
The points comprising the terminal_connection_zone must reside in the shape of the electrical device being accessed.
The points comprising the terminal_connection_zone shall be defined in the coordinate system of the device being accessed.
The connection_zone_category shall be provided if the terminal_connection_zone is provided.
The size of connection_zone_category shall be equal to the sizeof terminal_connection_zone if the terminal_connection_zone is provided.
Each member of connection_zone_category shall be for exactly one member of terminal_connection_zone.
The combination of the associated_definition and the name shall be unique within a population of Land_template_terminals.

ext_description.p: A Stratum_technology is either a or a . A Stratum_technology provides material properties, parametric data associated with the technology, and material identification.
specifies the role of the for the Stratum_technology. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the role of the for the Stratum_technology. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies the maximum of any feature of the . The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies one role of the of any feature of the . The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies either a conformal_coat, a fluid_like, or a stiff_laminate stiffness class of which the Stratum_technology is a member. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies one role of the of any feature of the . The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the words by which the Stratum_technology is known. Specifies the alphanumeric identifier of a Stratum_technology.
specifies the for the thickness of the Stratum_technology.
specifies the role of the for the Stratum_technology.
specifies one of an internal, external, all, primary, or secondary position of the for the Stratum_technology. Primary and secondary shall only be used if the member of Stratum_technology is a .
The name shall be unique within a population of Stratum_technologies.
If layer_position is , then Stratum_technology shall be .
If layer_position is , then Stratum_technology shall be .
The stratum_material shall be of type .

A Stratum_technology_link is a mean to provide a mechanism to simulate a layer stackup without using the Application Object. A Stratum_technology_link is a member of a sequence of such links. If there is more than one member in the sequence, all members except the first shall include a precedent_stratum_technology_link as a reference to the preceding link.
specifies the role of a for the Stratum_technology_link. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a for the Stratum_technology_link.
specifies a for the Stratum_technology_link.
The precedent_stratum_technology shall not be the subsequent_stratum_technology within a population of Stratum_technology_link.
The Stratum_technology_link shall not be the precedent_stratum_technology_link.
If the precedent_stratum_technology_link exists, the subsequent_stratum_technology attribute of precedent_stratum_technology_link shall be the precedent_stratum_technology.
The combination of precedent_stratum_technology and subsequent_stratum_technology shall be unique within a population of Stratum_technology_link.

A Passage_technology_parameters is the representation of design independent properties that will be used in support of a passage technology. A Passage_technology_parameters may be used by one or more passage technology.
the words by which the Passage_technology_parameters is known.
specifies a boolean value.
specifies a role of the for the Passage_technology_parameters. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a role of the for the Passage_technology_parameters.The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a role of the for the Passage_technology_parameters. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a real value for the Passage_technology_parameters. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a role of the for the Passage_technology_parameters. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a role of the for the Passage_technology_parameters. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the name shall be unique within a population of the Passage_technology_parameters.

The get_electrical_conductivity checks if the specified set of contains at least one that is electrically conductive.
It returns True if mi contains at least one that has it's set to one of: 'conductive', 'semi conductive' or 'super conductive'.
It returns False otherwise.
the specified set of .
